2011-06-10  Benoit Clennett-Sirois  <benoitcsirois@gmail.com>

    * Version 0.3 released.
	* Now allows pre-authorized payments and pre-auth capture
	* Using beanstream's newer SOAP API v. 1.3
	* Downloading of WSDL is now only optional, disabled by default.
	* 100% test coverage.

2011-02-28  Benoit Clennett-Sirois  <benoitcsirois@gmail.com>
	* First public release
